name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Introduction to the Kardashians
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Introduction to the Kardashians
long_desc: Have you had an intense desire to learn about Americas real first family, the Kardashians, your whole life and no way to fulfill it Look no further than this course as we will go deep into the KardashianJenner family history as well as their amazing reality TV show Keeping Up With the Kardashians. By the end of this course, you can expect to be familiar with the entire family tree, be a full expert on all things Kardashian and know how to fight for and defend your favorite Kardashian regardless of the scandal that may be facing them. This is the course you may have never knew you wanted, but definitely needed.

custom_fields.goals: By the end of this course, you can expect to be familiar with the entire family tree, be a full expert on all things Kardashian and know how to fight for and defend your favorite Kardashian regardless of the scandal that may be facing them. We will also dive deep into what it means to be an Influencer and what this means for the future of celebrities and media.
custom_fields.key_topics: History of Kardashians, Keeping Up With the Kardashians TV Show, and Future of Media.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Weekly short assignments with a Midterm and Final project based on the course materials.
custom_fields.relevance: The Kardashians and influencers in general have become obsessions of the public and many people don't understand why. This course is essential to understanding the enigma that is the Kardashian family and influencers/media personalities in general.
custom_fields.learning_resources: All information needed can be found on the internet and I will also provide links to good resources that will be needed to complete the projects and homework.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Short homeworks or projects will be assigned on a weekly basis.
